message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $95?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to accommodate my budget. I would like to counter with an offer of $100 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make one more adjustment. I can offer you the product for $105. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.

Hello Alice, thank you for considering my needs. I appreciate your efforts in adjusting the price. I would like to counter with an offer of $100 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
